```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

## Create a map
```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles()
my_map
```

## Add markers
```{r}
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat=1.3483, lng=103.6831, 
             popup="Nanyang Technological University")
my_map
```
